sql.if: AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `organization_attribute` attr WHERE attr.`object_id` = e.`object_id` AND attr.`status` = 1 AND attr.`entity_attribute_id` = 903 AND attr.`value_id` IS NOT NULL)

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o JOIN `organization_attribute` a ON (o.`object_id` = a.`object_id` AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.`entity_attribute_id` = 901) JOIN `organization_string_value` sc ON (a.`value_id` = sc.`id` AND sc.`value` = #{code} AND sc.`locale_id` = (SELECT l.`id` FROM `locale` l WHERE l.`system` = 1)) WHERE o.`status` IN (1, 0)

SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o JOIN `organization_attribute` a ON (o.`object_id` = a.`object_id` AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.`entity_attribute_id` = 900) JOIN `organization_string_value` sc ON (a.`value_id` = sc.`id` AND sc.`locale_id` = #{localeId} AND sc.`value` = #{name}) WHERE o.`status` IN (1, 0)

SELECT o.`object_id` FROM `organization` o LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` oa ON (oa.`status` = 1 AND oa.`object_id` = o.`object_id` AND oa.`entity_attribute_id` = 903) WHERE oa.`value_id` = #{parentId} AND o.`status` IN (1, 0)

SELECT DISTINCT o.`object_id`, o.`permission_id` FROM `organization` o LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` oa ON (oa.`status` = 1 AND oa.`object_id` = o.`object_id` AND oa.`entity_attribute_id` = 903) WHERE oa.`value_id` = #{parentId} AND o.`status` IN (1, 0)
